titles.title: A concurrent resolution providing for an adjournment of the Congress until September 9, 1987.

action.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate with an amendment by Voice Vote.
House Agreed to Senate Amendments by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 8/7/1987--Passed Senate amended. (Measure passed Senate, amended) Provides for an adjournment of the Senate from August 7 until September 9, 1987, and for the House of Representatives from August 7 or 8 until September 9, 1987.
